desc: Made with a satin weave fabric, this satin dress is a wardrobe staple. Soft to touch and extra luxe, a silky dress is all you need - just add a statement jacket and heeled boots to catch eyes. Its breathable and lightweight fabric make it perfect for warmer weather, and it's just as versatile for colder months too. With a shiny finish, nothing’s more iconic than a red satin dress, worn best with killer heels and diamante hoops. We love a satin maxi dress to transition from day to night, just swap trainers for heels.

desc: Made with a satin weave fabric, this satin dress is a wardrobe staple. Soft to touch and extra luxe, a silky dress is all you need - just add a statement jacket and heeled boots to catch eyes. Its breathable and lightweight fabric make it perfect for warmer weather, and it's just as versatile for colder months too. With a shiny finish, nothing’s more iconic than a red satin dress, worn best with killer heels and diamante hoops. We love a satin maxi dress to transition from day to night, just swap trainers for heels.

name: Plus Long Sleeve Tiered Dress
attributes: 100% Polyester. Machine wash. Model wears UK size 16.
desc: Bring a new kinda attitude in this latest piece from our collection of plus size dresses. Available in UK sizes 16-24, our range of curve dresses carries all the on-trend pieces you need to feel confident. Whether it's a plus size black dress or skater style you're adding to your basket, we promise no more awkward fits, just dresses you can depend on. Work a flattering plus size shirt dress or smock shapes during the day, then take on the night in sexy styles, maxi lengths and Bardot necklines.
